Package niagara.connection_server

Class Summary
Catalog  
CommunicationServlet  
ConnectionManager The ConnectionManager listens on a well known port for connection requests.
Console Console uses the standard input to provide rudimentary control over the server.
HTTPClientServlet  
HTTPRivuletServlet  
MQPHandler  
NiagraServer The main Niagra Server which receives all the client requests It has an instance of query engine and a SEClient for contacting the SE Server
RequestHandler There is one request handler per client and receives all the requests from that client Then that request is further dispatched to the appropriate module and results sent back
RequestMessage  
RequestParser This class is responsible for creating a SAX Parser for parsing incoming request messages as well as implementing DocumentHandler interface
ResponseMessage This is the class that hold the information of the response message
ResultTransmitter This is the thread for transmitting out the results of a query to the client Every query that gets submitted to the server has a corresponding resultTranmitting thread
ServerQueryInfo Stores the info about a query in the server
StreamMaterializer  
XMLQueryPlanParser  
 

Enum Summary
RequestMessage.RequestType  
 

Exception Summary
ConfigurationError  
InvalidPlanException
